trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter that retrieves a list of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"></xref> controls in the current container.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um conversor de tipos que obtém uma lista de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"> </xref> controlos no contentor atual.

trans-unit.source: The AssociatedControlConverter class derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter> class and provides a type converter specifically for controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class.
trans-unit.target: A classe de AssociatedControlConverter deriva da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter>classe e fornece um conversor de tipos especificamente para controlos que deriva da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter>

trans-unit.source: It is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label.AssociatedControlID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
For more information about type converters, see [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) or [Generalized Type Conversion](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre os conversores de tipo, consulte [como: implementar um conversor de tipos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) ou [generalizado conversão do tipo](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AssociatedControlConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AssociatedControlConverter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: **Note** You should never access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: **Tenha em atenção** nunca deve aceder diretamente um conversor de tipos.

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, chame o conversor adequado, utilizando um <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>objeto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte os exemplos <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the provided control inherits from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o controlo fornecido herda <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The control instance to test whether it is a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A instância de controlo para testar se se trata de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: if the control inherits from the class; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se o control herda o classe; caso contrário, .
